description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Quantity: 2 position
              

              Working time: from Monday to Friday, from 8:30 - 12:00; from 13:00 - 17:30
              

              What will you do?
              
              -	Hands-on programming experience in building near real time or batch processing based data analytics cloud platforms using Java, no-sql and other related frameworks.
              
              -	 Other tasks assigned by Development Manager.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              What you need to have
              
              -	3+ years working with Java
              
              -	1+ years working on a Linux platform
              
              -	Experience with utilizing Git for version control
              
              -	Prefer candidates who have experiences in:
              
              -	Performance and scalability concepts of complex systems
              
              -	Applications programming (Java, python, RESTful APIs. Etc.)
              
              -	Good at English, especially in writing.
              
              -	Have a passion for learning, good personality, good communication
              

              Benefits:
              
              -	Salary and bonus based on performance and experience
              
              -	13th month salary
              
              -	A half year bonus
              
              -	Insurances base on your real salary
              
              -	Annual travel
              
              -	Salary review once a year
              
              -	Comfortable working environment and funny colleagues
              
              -	Salary: up to 1200$
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                Salary and bonus based on performance and experience + 13th month salary
               







                Insurances base on your real salary
               







                Annual travel
